channel.title: Cannot upgrade-nonroot
channel.description:
So fresh install on VM, type in the command and this is what i get:
Certificate verification failed: The certificate is NOT trusted. The revocation or OCSP data are old and have been superseded. Could not handshake: Error in the certificate verification. [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050] Reading package lists... Done E: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com/dists/bookworm/InRelease Certificate verification failed: The certificate is NOT trusted. The revocation or OCSP data are old and have been superseded. Could not handshake: Error in the certificate verification. [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050] E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead. zsh: exit 100 upgrade-nonroot

item.title: Cannot upgrade-nonroot
item.dc:creator: Banebere
item.description:
So fresh install on VM, type in the command and this is what i get:

Certificate verification failed: The certificate is NOT trusted. The revocation or OCSP data are old and have been superseded. Could not handshake: Error in the certificate verification. [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050]
Reading package lists… Done
E: Failed to fetch tor+https://deb.kicksecure.com/dists/bookworm/InRelease Certificate verification failed: The certificate is NOT trusted. The revocation or OCSP data are old and have been superseded. Could not handshake: Error in the certificate verification. [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050]
E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.
zsh: exit 100 upgrade-nonroot
